content.p: We have data storage solutions to support your research needs. For personal work, we recommend OneDrive, which comes with 5TB of storage. For collaborative work, we recommend Microsoft Teams. Each Team starts with 1TB of storage and can be increased to 25TB upon request. Central Performance Storage is available for researchers who: PGRs, post-docs and research staff. OneDrive and Teams are free at point of use. Central Performance Storage is available up to 1TB free at point of use. This can be expanded up to 5TB upon request. Thereafter, costs are Â£58 per TB/yr. More information on storage can be found here (log-in required) Central Performance Storage can be requested here (log-in required) Faults can be reported by submitting a service or support request. If you're struggling please get in touch with the team Submit and track requests to solve your IT issues Updates on the University's core IT services
